name: Fee Of Life
description:
in this game you play as a small robot on the moon that has one task to defeat the rogue mining robot 
explore the overworld be using the directional arrows or WASD and pressing space on the blue tab you wish to play on
- made for the braceys 2021.1 game jam - this relates to theme as  the battery heals and makes the player stronger when being held so stronger together
-controls - 
move WASD or Arrow keys
pickup battery left Shift
jump with space
